RAnEn 3.6.2

RAnEn::getAssociatedForecasts

getAssociatedForecasts.Rd

RAnEn::getAssociatedForecasts returns the most similar past forecasts that are identified using this analog ensemble and associated with each analog ensemble member. In other words, this funtion returns the most similar past forecasts to the current forecasts.

getAssociatedForecasts(AnEn, config, forecast.parameter, i.station = NA,
  i.test.day = NA, i.flt = NA, similarity.name = "similarity",
  forecasts.name = "forecasts", members.to.extract = NA)

Arguments

AnEn

The AnEn class object returned by generateAnalogs.
config

The Configuration class object used to generate AnEn.
forecast.parameter

The parameter index for which variable to extract in the forecast array in config.
i.station

The station index in AnEn to extract.
i.test.day

The test day index in AnEn to extract.
i.flt

The FLT index in AnEn to extract.
similarity.name

The similarity name to be used in AnEn. This is useful when you have a different similarity matrice name to the regular one.
forecasts.name

The forecast name to be used in config. This is useful when you have a different similarity matrice name to the regular one.
members.to.extract

The number of ensemble members to extract. By default to extract all members.

Value

An array with the same dimension as analogs in AnEn. For more information of each dimension, please refer to generateAnalogs. The only difference is that the values in this array are extracted from the most similar past forecast that is associated with each analog ensemble member.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
